title: NEW options for bubble chart sizes | Power BI update august 2023
excerpt: This month the power bi team released 2 new options to decide how to represent the bubble size in Power BI: Data range and magnitude.  In this video I will show you the difference between them.  Join this channel membership to get access to all the recorded bites as they become available: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw/join
